thread.title: Cute and Quirky Hotel with Lovely Staff
thread.title_full: Cute and Quirky Hotel with Lovely Staff - Review of Hotel Original Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: TibbsT1
title: Cute and Quirky Hotel with Lovely Staff
text:
My partner and I stayed at the Hotel Original for three days for a long weekend break, we arrived early and were given an earlier check in - Great start.
Our room was lovely with a gorgeous free standing bath and huge bed.
The staff were five star - helped us with our day trips and helped us organise a dinner cruise.
Location was great, we had a lovely walk to Norte Dame and for the rest jumped in Ubers which were with you within a min - There is also a metro a stones throw away from the hotel so you will have no issue with getting around.
The day we left I noticed I had left my shopping bag at the hotel, I emailed in as a shot in the dark to see if they had it and they did. The manager Fabien was amazing and had the package sent over to me in London - never would l have expected that.
Amazing hotel, Amazing Staff - Will definitely be returning!
Room Tip: Definitely get a bath :) See more room tips
